puzzle.title: X Marks the...
puzzle.hint: 2 down is OX. 4 across is EARWAX. 16 down is TAXES. See anything eXciting yet?
Every crossword answer contains an X.

The answers to the clues are listed below in crossword order:
Across: ONYX, EARWAX, ELIXIR, AXIS, HEXAGON, XCHROMOSOME, XA, XI, TEXAS, SYNTAXES, AXLE, XENON, EXILES, APEX, XOR, XS
Down: EXPLICIT, OX, XE, EXHALE, XEROX, APEX, NOX, LYNXES, IBEXES, TAX, AUXILIARY, AXE, EPOXY, LAX, SAX
Join the dots. What could the dots be...?

Join the X's in the answers in the order given in the blurb beneath the title. So, for 7-4d-1-7-12, join the X in 7 (AXIS) to the X in 4d (EXHALE), then join the X in 4d (EXHALE) to the X in 1 (EXPLICIT), etc.
Joining the dots makes letters. The first letter is an E.
